## New input1:
```java
    int year = 2020;
    Half half = Half.H1;
```
This input is valid because the year is within the valid range (MIN_YEAR to MAX_YEAR) and the half is a valid value (1 or 2).

## New input2:
```java
    int year = 2000;
    Half half = Half.H2;
```
This input is valid because the year is within the valid range (MIN_YEAR to MAX_YEAR) and the half is a valid value (1 or 2).

    Half half = Half.H2;

This input is valid because the year is within the valid range (MIN_YEAR to MAX_YEAR) and the half is a valid value (1 or 2).
